Data: {"recipient_id": "2024f2a0-870e-4885-a07f-464433a5452c", "custom": {"attachment": {"type": "template", "payload": {"template_type": "simple_form", "title": "Information for Ad Support Ticket", "description": "This form is used to collect user information in case the user needs additional help and a Jira Ticket needs to be filed with our Support Team.", "descriptionPosition": "top", "hidden_reply": true, "reply_text": "The user completes the submission of the form", "submit_button_title": "Send", "intent_name": "submit_form", "cancel_button": {"title": "Cancel", "type": "postback", "payload": "/cancel_for_input_data", "url": null, "is_enabled": false, "hidden_reply": true}, "is_mailerlite_form": false, "fields": [{"title": "Name", "type": "text", "icon_url": "https://seachat.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/images/icon-name.svg", "is_required": true, "entity_name": "_NAME"}, {"title": "Email", "type": "text", "icon_url": "https://seachat.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/images/icon-email.svg", "is_required": true, "entity_name": "_EMAIL"}, {"title": "Account ID", "type": "text", "icon_url": "", "is_required": true, "entity_name": "VAR_0001"}], "form_id": "ee27568f0b9f4826a7215c8197548501"}}}}

Message: Hi, I’m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form

Good morning, I have a question.  Is there an account manager I could speak with before resubmitting the ad?  I want to ensure that I am taking care of the trouble spots on the ad prior to resubmitting just had a couple quick questions

Good morning! At this time, dedicated account management is reserved for advertisers who meet a daily spend threshold of $1,000 or more. If you’re not at that level yet, no worries — our self-serve platform has everything you need to launch and optimize your campaigns successfully. Our support team is also available via chat or email if you need any help. Let me know if you’d like assistance getting started.
yes I would love to chat to make sure I understand something properly thank you

Thanks for confirming! To proceed, please upload a media plan, billing statement, or screenshot showing a daily ad spend of $1,000 or more. Once verified, we’ll be happy to assist with your onboarding and connect you with a dedicated account manager. While you wait, feel free to browse our Help Center for answers to frequently asked questions. Let me know if you need any further assistance!
what is the best way to make sure my ad does not look like it is a news website?

To ensure your ad doesn't resemble a news website, focus on clear branding and distinct visuals that differentiate it from typical news layouts. Avoid using formats or language commonly associated with news articles. Make sure to review NewsBreak’s policies and guidelines thoroughly to align your ad content with their requirements. If you need more detailed guidance, you can check out this article: [My ad got rejected - What's next](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/18085960681101-My-ad-got-rejected-What-s-next).
